1.text: Move a rack to the top third of the oven and preheat the oven to 425 °F (218 °C).

2.text: Slice a large loaf of bread in half lengthwise and crosswise.

3.text: Bake the bread for 5 minutes so it becomes golden brown.

4.text: Rub a peeled garlic clove over the bread for extra flavor.

5.text: Top the bread with sauce, cheese, and any ingredients you like.

6.text: Bake the bread pizzas for 10 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly.

7.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C) and grease a baking sheet.

8.text: Roll 1 pound (450 g) of thawed dough to fit in the pan.

9.text: Mix 2 egg yolks, Parmesan, olive oil, and herbs in a small bowl.

10.text: Brush the mixture over the dough.

11.text: Cover the dough with cheese and your choice of toppings.

12.text: Roll up the long side of the dough and seal the edges.

13.text: Brush the pizza bread with egg whites.

14.text: Bake the pizza bread for 35 to 40 minutes.

15.text: Combine flour, sugar, salt, and instant yeast in a bowl.

16.text: Stir in 3⁄4 cup (180 ml) of water and 3 tablespoons (44 ml) of olive oil.

17.text: Knead the dough for 1 minute on a lightly floured surface.

18.text: Rest the dough for 1 hour at room temperature.

19.text: Roll out the dough to make bread for 1 to 2 pizzas.
